channel.title: Gadgets on PR
channel.description: Recent content in Gadgets on PR

item.title: My Raspberry Pi Collection
item.description: I’ve always been interested in Raspberry Pi. I pre-ordered, waited for about 3+ months and even paid Customs (ridiculous amount) to import my very first Pi.

item.title: Laptop Cooling Pad & Sudden Motion Sensor
item.description: Finally I found a good usecase to test the Sudden Motion Sensor of my macbook pro. I was curious to know whether there is an impact of cooling pad’s fan.
